about.aboutBody: After a life & career change in 2019 where I started studying web development, I went ahead & short later grabbed small clients where I was able to create projects from scratch & learn through work. Later, I worked with customers on tech issues, constantly performing software testing & troubleshooting. Now, my career objective is to grow my web development career by working with great teams excited to pass their wisdom, within healthy businesses, & through dynamic & inspiring projects where I can improve myself while while positively impacting others.

experience.exp1Body: Creating, constructing, or maintaining websites & software applications while collaborating with other developers & teams for awesome people like you!
experience.exp2Body: Ensured user satisfaction through log analysis & troubleshooting for software & hardware. Assisted with small front-end bugs, custom scripts, testing, & built & maintained documentation.
experience.exp3Body: Worked closely with clients to create small pages, blogs, & themes for different objectives. Contributed with ideas & built front-end solutions with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, & jQuery.
